{{cpp/chrono/title|operator&lt;&lt;{{petty|(std::chrono::year_month_weekday)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month_weekday/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os,
                const std::chrono::year_month_weekday&amp; ymwd );
}}

Outputs a textual representation of {{c|ymwd}} into {{c|os}}, as if by

{{cc|
os &lt;&lt; std::format(os.getloc(), STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{}/{:L}/{:L}"),
                  ymwd.year(), ymwd.month(), ymwd.weekday_indexed());
}}

where {{c|STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{}/{:L}/{:L}")}} is {{c|"{}/{:L}/{:L}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|char}}, and {{c|L"{}/{:L}/{:L}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|wchar_t}}.

===Return value===
{{c|os}}
